data.title: Putin announces that Russia will annex Crimea into the Russian Federation
Putin's top aide mocks US sanctions: 'The only thing that interests me about the US is Tupac, and I don't need a visa for that'.
TURKEY: Under Ottoman Empire treaty with Catherine the Great, Crimea returns to Turkey
Western powers begin process to hold Kim Jung Un accountable for crimes against humanity.
NYTIMES: Computer programmed to send flight MH370 off flight path.
Malaysia has agreed to hand over all raw data to the US and UK. No longer will other countries rely on the Malaysian interpretation of the data.
Turkey Warns Russia it Will Blockade Bosphorus if Violence Occurs

Thousands of Crimean Tatars attended the funeral today of Reshat Ametov, a human rights activist who disappeared on March 3rd in Simferopol. His body, showing signs of torture, was found two weeks later.
Shots fired, officer taken from Ukraine base in Crimea
